an7.61:2.3: saññaṃ mā manasākāsi → saññaṃ manasikareyyāsi (sya-all); saññaṃ manasākāsi (mr) | taṃ saññaṃ mā bahulamakāsi → taṃ saññaṃ bahulaṃ kareyyāsi (sya-all); taṃ saññaṃ bahulamakāsi (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
an7.61:11.4: nāhaṃ moggalāna sabbeheva samaggaṃ vaṇṇayāmi gahaṭṭhehi pabbajitehi kho ahaṃ moggallāna samaggaṃ vaṇṇayāmi (mr)
an7.61:11.8: manussarāhasseyyakāni → manussarāhaseyyakāni (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed) | saṃsaggaṃ → samaggaṃ (mr)
an7.61:13.7: na kiñci → na ca kiñci (bj, sya-all, mr)
